power.title: Blood Sacrifice
power.fluff: You wound yourself, offering your pain to the spirits in exchange for a more telling strike
power.section: true Effect:You can choose to take 1d10 or 2d6 damage. You cannot reduce or negate this damage.

true If you choose to take this damage, you gain a bonus to the damage roll for this power equal to the damage you took + your Constitution modifier. If the damage bloodied you, the bonus increases by +5.
Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss:If you chose to take the damage, you deal one-half the minimum damage.

power.title: Crushing Rush
power.fluff: The impact of your attack smashes your foe back to crush it against solid terrain
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
true If the target ends this push adjacent to blocking terrain, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
Miss:Damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus, and you push the target 1 square.

power.title: Curtain of Steel
power.fluff: You are the pacing lion, the circling predator, and no attack will come toward you without being answered in kind
power.section: Trigger:An enemy adjacent to you makes an attack against you
Attack:Melee 1the triggering enemy adjacent to you Strength vs. AC
1 Rageblood Vigor:If the triggering attack hits you, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Constitution modifier.
1 Thaneborn Triumph:If the triggering attack misses you, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Charisma modifier.
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Deny Escape
power.fluff: In your bloodlust, letting an enemy go isn't an option, so you attack with a force that prevents it from escaping your fury
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Whirling Frenzy:You can choose to deal 2[W] (main) + 2[W] (off-hand) + your Strength modifier damage instead.
Miss:Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Devastating Leverage
power.fluff: You swing your weapon in a wide arc, using the terrible power generated by its length to smash your enemy to the ground
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Effect:If the target is not adjacent to you, you knock it prone.

power.title: Fearsome Smash
power.fluff: Smashing your weapon through your foe's defenses injures both body and will
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. Will
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Thaneborn Triumph:The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -3 penalty).
Special: You can also use this power as an immediate interrupt with the following trigger and hit:
1 Trigger:An enemy adjacent to you hits you
1 Hit:1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the start of its next turn.
2 Thaneborn Triumph:The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -3 penalty).

power.title: Feast of Violence
power.fluff: You drop your guard as you come close for your attack, drawing primal strength from the violence directed at you
power.section: true Effect:You can choose to provoke reactive strikes.
true If you do, this attack deals +1[W] damage. You also gain a cumulative +1 bonus to the attack roll for each creature that attacks you, or a +2 bonus for a solo creature.
true If a creature scores a critical hit against you or a solo creature hits you, the additional damage increases to +2[W] instead.
Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss:If you chose to provoke reactive strikes, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + 1 for each reactive strike that hit you.

power.title: Great Shout
power.fluff: You slam your weapon into a foe, then give voice to the fury of your ancestors, cowing those who dare to stand against you
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy within 5 squares of you is terrified of your shout.
Miss:Each enemy within 3 squares of you is terrified of your shout.
true Effect:Each creature that is terrified of your shout takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Rageblood Vigor:If you are bloodied, the penalty equals your Constitution modifier instead.
true 1 Thaneborn Triumph:Bloodied enemies take a penalty equal to 2 + one-half your Charisma modifier instead.
true 1 Thunderborn Wrath:The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Harbinger of Doom
power.fluff: You hack through one foe, and your battle cry heralds doom for the enemies before you
power.section: Primary Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true You make the Howl Attack as a close wave 3. The primary target must be in the wave.
Miss:You make the Howl Attack as a close wave 2. The primary target must be in the wave.

part.section: true Effect:Each howl target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Thunderborn Wrath:The vulnerable equals 5 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Looming Threat
power.fluff: An ally might have raised a foe's ire, but once you strike, that enemy must pay attention to you
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If the target is marked by an ally, this attack deals +1[W] additional damage, and you must mark the target until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Rageblood Vigor:While the target remains marked by you, you gain a power bonus to damage rolls against it equal to your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Thaneborn Triumph:While the target remains marked by you, the ally that was marking the target gains a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Charisma modifier.
Whirling Frenzy:While the target remains marked by you, you can make a reactive strike against it as an immediate interrupt if it shifts.

power.title: Shattering Strike
power.fluff: The primal force flowing from your body enables your attack to strike true even against enemies that are not fully there
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier force damage. This damage ignores the insubstantial quality.

power.title: Slash and Slash Again
power.fluff: You strike hard and then lay into enemies all around you
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC (main weapon)
true Hit:2[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage.
Effect:Until the start of your next turn, you can use the following action at-will:
1 Free Interrupt:Trigger: An enemy starts its turn adjacent to you; You deal 1[W] (off-hand) damage to the triggering enemy.
2 Whirling Frenzy:1[W] (off-hand) + Dexterity modifier damage.

power.title: Tide of Blood
power.fluff: Your anger sweeps over every enemy nearby, drawing on the flowing blood to fuel the tide of your assault on one of them
power.section: Thunderborn Wrath:You can choose for this power to deal thunder damage and to gain the Thunder keyword. If you do, you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier on a hit, or half the distance on a miss.
Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true The attack deals additional damage equal to the number of enemies adjacent to you.
true 1 Rageblood Vigor:The additional damage equals the number of enemies within a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier instead.
true 1 Thaneborn Triumph:You also deal additional damage equal to twice the number of bloodied allies within a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

true 1 Whirling Frenzy:Instead of dealing additional damage, if you are wielding two melee weapons, you can choose to deal damage to each enemy adjacent to you other than the target. The damage equals your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Wheat to the Scythe
power.fluff: The enemies fall before your weapon's wide arc, like wheat to the scythe
power.section: Attack:Close weapon bursteach enemy in the burst that you can see Strength vs. AC
true Hit:1[W] + Strength modifier + 1d6 damage and the target falls prone.
Miss:Half damage, and you must push the target to the closest space outside of the burst.
true Effect:You regain a number of hit points equal to the number of enemies you hit, or equal to twice the number of enemies you hit if you are bloodied.
